name: Oxite Dissolver
description: More efficient than the Oxidizer , this is used in tandem with Oxygen Containers placed into the dissolver. The front slots of the deployable only accept Oxygen Containers and will automatically fill said containers from Oxite placed into the machine when supplied with Sulfur . A stack of sulfur will last sixteen minutes and forty seconds, producing 0.1 Liters of Oxygen every two seconds.
